titleStmt.title: Gods mercies and Ierusalems miseries A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse, the 25. of Iune. 1609. By Lancelot Dawes, Master of Arts and fellow of Queenes Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Dawes, Lancelot, 1580-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by John Windet] for Cle. Knight,
